name: Co-Developer GPT Engine
description: API for executing external actions, fetching URL content, searching files, and managing file content.

tools.name: executeExternalAction
tools.description: Runs a specified external action with optional arguments and input.

actionName.description: The name of the action to execute.

arguments.description: Optional additional arguments for the action.

tools.name: fetchUrlTextContent
tools.description: Fetch text content from a given URL.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from.

raw.description: Return raw HTML or PDF content without converting to markdown.

tools.name: grepFiles
tools.description: Search for lines in text files matching the given regex.

path.description: Relative path to the directory or file to search.

fileRegex.description: Optional regex to filter file names.

grepRegex.description: Regex to filter lines in the files.

contextLines.description: Number of context lines to include with each match.

tools.name: listFiles
tools.description: Recursively lists files in a directory with optional filters.

path.description: Relative path to the directory to list.

grepRegex.description: Regex to filter files that contain a line matching this pattern.

listDirectories.description: If true, lists directories instead of files.

maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines to read from the file.

startLine.description: Line number to start reading from.

tools.name: replaceInFile
tools.description: Replaces occurrences of strings in a file.

search.description: The literal string to be replaced.

tools.name: writeFile
tools.description: Overwrite a file with new content.

content.description: Content to write to the file.
